resale.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the activity of selling goods that you have bought from someone else
resale.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the selling of goods that you have bought from someone else
resale.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: It began buying computer peripherals from Hitachifor resale to its European customers.
resale.translation[1].definitions[1].def: things, especially houses, that are being sold by the person who bought them
